36c928a1-e769-4ce3-916e-6ba035e151e4.Text: The Operator moves up to 3 squares without provoking attacks of opportunity and becomes the lowest priority target for opponents. Using this ability ends the Operator's movement for the turn.

91418397-dd85-41b7-9279-92242bfdd7fd.Text: When all exploit stacks would be removed by an ability, one exploit stack will remain.

9f23de27-0cce-469d-b7ab-c30d5226abcb.Text: When the Operator uses perfect spot they become the lowest priority target for enemies.

013ae2c9-39c9-4eca-bb35-61ab418cf934.Text: After an Operator has become the lowest priority target they gain +10% damage for the remainder of the turn.

6729cd2f-21da-4488-b74b-22c04380ec78.Text: The Soldier makes a melee attack with a ranged weapon, dealing {uip|Damage|22d6c1b32a6d47f4899a370e28cf16f9} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of weapon damage and possibly pushing them back 1 square. This attack does not count toward the attack limit per turn.

04ee52b7-c43e-4c95-b062-cbaf73f06547.Text: The Soldier's shotgun shots push back targets even if they miss.

fcc89cbd-aac7-45f1-a400-b238fd3b348a.Text: All of the Soldier's shotgun attacks against adjacent enemies automatically hit.

12430c89-2d4f-49d4-8ece-daf1c7a4659b.Text: Using Pistol Whip with a two-handed weapon does 50% more damage.

1b8f61ad-f9a1-4574-815a-cb4e667b9145.Text: The Officer increases all attributes by their Fellowship Bonus until the end of the turn.

54f4cb6f-e044-40d5-a88c-65f66263c2a6.Text: If the Officer's Fellowship is higher than their Agility, their Dodge will be calculated from Fellowship instead.

5e09004b-516a-49ec-bf79-88fd1e78d923.Text: When the Officer uses Deeds Not Words they also gain +10% armor.

e21f8416-abba-48c4-abec-fc7012a71313.Text: While under the effect of Deeds Not Words, the Officer's attacks cannot miss.

fd93ef92-60d3-4e84-a5ee-4a182e40d4ae.Text: Enemies hit by the Warrior's Flame and Melta attacks suffer Ballistic Skill Bonus additional levels of Burning.

5f399f87-e123-4be5-beb0-89bed9ca941e.Text: When the Warrior uses a Flame or Melta weapon the first time in a round, they gain +1 AP.

fc2f1ba5-c525-469b-b287-4802d8aedde6.Text: The Warrior's Flame and Melta attacks gain Ballistic Skill Bonus/2 minimum damage.

b1fd07a1-17b7-4c09-b179-77d4d35e4634.Text: All burning targets within 2 cells of the Warrior suffer an instance of burning damage.
